== basic.css
==================================================
/* this should be removed */
/* line 4, samples/basic.scss */
html, body {
  font-family: Consolas;
  height: 100%;
  width: 100%;
  color: black;
}

/* line 11, samples/basic.scss */
ul {
  list-style: none;
}

/* line 15, samples/basic.scss */
li {
  margin: 1px;
  padding: 1em;
}

/* line 20, samples/basic.scss */
.row {
  display: flex;
}

/* line 24, samples/basic.scss */
.red, .green, .blue {
  color: white;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition-property: background-color;
  transition-duration: 250ms;
}

/* line 34, samples/basic.scss */
.red {
  background-color: #ff4d4d;
}

/* line 38, samples/basic.scss */
.red:hover {
  background-color: red;
}

/* line 43, samples/basic.scss */
.green {
  background-color: #00cd00;
}

/* line 47, samples/basic.scss */
.green:hover {
  background-color: green;
}

/* line 52, samples/basic.scss */
.blue {
  background-color: #4d4dff;
}

/* line 56, samples/basic.scss */
.blue:hover {
  background-color: blue;
}

/*# sourceMappingURL=basic.css.map */
